title: The USFL Tests Football Tech. The NFL Could Adopt It. - The New York Times
content: The USFL Tests Football Tech. The NFL Could Adopt It.  The New York Times
description: The U.S.F.L. is testing tech that could resolve disputes over where balls are spotted, clearly show if a first down was reached and track players who stand too high on tackles. The N.F.L. is watching.
